clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in right lower lobe.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in right lower lobe.
Well-defined nodule measuring 38 mm in right lower lobe.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of right lower lobe.
Small pneumothorax on the right lower lobe side.
Focal consolidation in right lower lobe with air bronchogram.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
